Summary: saw multi-colored object w/3 white lights in triangle & 1 red ctr. light blinking
divs: sighting details on saturday evening, october 23rd, 2010 i, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg), was heading west in a vehicle on center st. just east of 69th st. when i noticed a multi-colored object approximately a half of a mile south of center st. at an altitude of approximately 500 feet. the object was heading east\southeastly towards offutt air force base in bellevue, ne which is a suburb of omaha, ne. the object was only multi-colored until i noticed the underside of the object had three(3) bright white lights in a triangular formation with a center red blinking or strobing light. that's when i recognized the object as a typical "flying triangle." then i noticed the "front leading white light" dimmed out. i wasn't able to continue to observe the object, because i had to keep my eyes on the road. the object didn't appear to be like anything i had seen before due to the array of colored lights. i liken it to a christmas tree on its side or a christmas reef "floating through the air." it did not make a sound. i made sure i did not have a problem hearing it, because i turned off the radio and rolled down the window in the vehicle. it appeared to be just "gliding" along. the object didn't produce any sound that i could detect even though it was just approximately a half mile away at approximately 500 feet in altitude. i have seen multi-colored flying objects before hand and since then, but that was the only occasion that i was able to identify the object as a known\classified u.a.p. due to the fact of the "flying triangle" signature.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There was one other sighting in Omaha on or around October 23rd 2010
